section.p: You are enrolled in the janissaries, a battalion in the Uttakin army composed entirely of slave warriors. You are trained as a scout. . If the result is higher than your SCOUTING rating, then you can add one to that rating.

That summer, a large warband of steppe nomads cross the mountains to raid Uttaku. The janissaries are dispatched along with several regiments of mercenaries to deal with the threat. You are sent on a mission to scout out the enemy positions.
